Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Suburban Pro Studios
Reviews.Content: This camera has worked great since day 1 inside my recording studio. We use a few of them to cover different areas inside our facility and they work great. At this price they're a steal. I'm purchasing more.

Reviews.Title: Worst surveillance system!
Reviews.Author: german rodriguez "rodriguez"
Reviews.Content: This is the worst security camera I have even had. It does not like what it says in the ad. It said IP66, NO WAY,it can only use indoor. And its IR Distance isn't clear for 10 feet away. I found the image quality grainy even in the daytime. Poor quality!

ProductInfo.Features:
The Video Security Camera Can Be Used As One Component of Surveillance Systems in House, Hotel, Large Square, Road, etc. Various Occasions.
IP66 Waterproof Level, No Audio, 3.6mm Lens for Wide View Angle, BNC Connection, DC 12V 1000MA Regulated Power Supply.
Image Sensor: 1/4" Sharp CCD Sensor, CDS Sensor. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TVL. Signal System: NTSC. Effective Pixels: 512(H) x 492(V).
The Distributed 5mm Diametrical 850nm Wavelength 24 pcs Infrared LEDs, Makes It Have Good Night Vision Up to 65.6 Feet..
Silver Color, Aluminum Alloy Material, Quite Small with Only 3.15 x 1.97 x 1.97 inch Size, Auto White Balance, Internal Sync Speed, Backlight Compensation.
ProductInfo.Name: SecurityIng - Silver Mini Size 420 TVL 1/4 Inch Sharp CCD Sensor Night Vision Indoor Outdoor Bullet Security Camera, 3.6mm Lens, IP66 Waterproof Level, 24 Pcs IR LEDs
